EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The (non-SH) player produces a dagger in their right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Text.Value: *You recognise this as a trial, where initiates would prove themselves to Lady Shar. This one would challenge their combat prowess.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart-only narration. Visuals should favour her here.

Text.Value: Vanquish your old life to receive my wisdom.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player looks at the Shar statue before them and hear's Shar's disembodied voice

Companion SH produces a dagger in her right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Text.Value: Another trial. I need to do this, same as before.

EditorData.logicalname: SH asked to to a trial before

Text.Value: If you're going to just stand there and stare, at least let me go ahead with the trial.
Try it for yourself then - perhaps I'll learn from your death.

EditorData.NodeContext: Angry retort. (player has refused her request to do a trial herself)

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Companion SH produces a dagger in her right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Text.Value: Go on then - you do it.
*Another bowl, bearing the stains of an ancient blood offering.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player looks at a large bowl being held by a Shar statue. Close-up of a dried blood stain in the base of the bowl.

Text.Value: Spill some of your blood in the bowl.
*Another of Lady Shar's trials, that her initiates must face. This one would challenge their combat prowess.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart-only narration. Visuals should favour her here.

Text.Value: I thought we had a shared understanding - and a shared respect. Perhaps not.
This is one of Lady Shar's trials. Allow me - please.
*The bowl contains an ancient, rust-coloured bloodstain. It forms a neat disc, as if spilled calmly and willingly.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player looks at a large bowl being held by a Shar statue. Close-up of a dried blood stain in the base of the bowl.

Synopsis: For when a player interacts with the statue to begin the double combat trial in the Shar temple.
